title: US1 - Dependency Declaration
description: Implement dependency declaration and resolution capabilities

title: Implement dependency declaration command
description: Create 'sl deps add' command to add external dependencies to spec.mod
design: Command: sl deps add <repo-url> [branch] [path] [--alias], create/update spec.mod
acceptance_criteria: Can add dependencies with validation, preserve existing entries

title: Spec Dependency Linking
description: Implement golang-style dependency locking and linking for specifications, allowing teams to declare external spec dependencies, resolve them with cryptographic verification, and reference specific sections across repositories.

title: Implement reference parser
description: Create parser for markdown links in spec.md files
design: Parse [Name](repo-url#spec-id#section-id) syntax using regex and validate components
acceptance_criteria: Can parse valid references and report errors for invalid syntax

title: Foundational Phase
description: Core infrastructure that must complete before any user story can start

title: Initialize Go project structure
description: Create Go module and basic project structure for dependency management
design: Create cmd/main.go with cobra CLI framework, go.mod with dependencies: go-git/v4, cobra, viper, golang.org/x/crypto
acceptance_criteria: Go module initialized, can run 'go mod tidy' successfully

title: US3 - Version Management
description: Implement dependency update and version pinning capabilities

title: Implement SpecManifest parser
description: Create parser for spec.mod files with dependency declarations
design: Parse text format: require <repo-url> <version> <spec-path> with optional id <spec-id>
acceptance_criteria: Can parse valid spec.mod and report errors for invalid syntax, supports all version formats

title: Implement Lockfile entry structure
description: Create data structures for spec.sum entries with SHA-256 verification
acceptance_criteria: Can parse and validate lockfile entries, support hash verification

title: US4 - Conflict Detection
description: Implement dependency conflict detection and resolution

title: Setup Phase
description: Project initialization and CLI framework setup

title: Setup CLI command structure
description: Implement cobra CLI structure with subcommands for deps, refs, graph, vendor
design: Create root command with subcommands: deps add/list/resolve/update, refs validate/list, graph show, vendor
acceptance_criteria: CLI shows help with all subcommands, basic structure works

title: US5 - Vendoring
description: Implement dependency vendoring for offline use

title: Setup configuration management
description: Implement file-based configuration for auth tokens, cache settings, and tool preferences
design: Use viper for config management, create .spec-config/auth.json and .spec-config/config.yaml
acceptance_criteria: Can store and retrieve configuration values, supports environment variable overrides
